text: The 1997 European Promotion Cup for Junior Men was the first edition of the basketball European Promotion Cup for U18 men's teams, today known as FIBA U18 European Championship Division C. It was played in Andorra la Vella, Andorra, from 8 to 12 July 1997.FIBA Archive Moldova men's national under-18 basketball team won the tournament. ==Participating teams== * * * * * * * * ==First round== In the first round, the teams were drawn into two groups of four.
